Points.title: title here
Points.Description: QuestMotors have their Employee Management System on Azure Cloud SQL and Web Front-end. The Company employs around 20,000 active force across various geographies including portfolios like Production, Sales/Marketing, Customer Support services, Legal etc.

Popup.Text: QuestMotors has got  their Employee360 system which having 4 primary modules like Employee , Department , Shift and Job Candidate
The Employee module has various attributes like Employee Name, Job Title, Organization level etc. and the user can create, update and delete employees here.
The Department module has various attributes like department names, group name and the user can create update delete departments here.
The Shift module has various attributes like shift name, start time, end time and the user can create update delete shifts here.
The Job Candidate module has various attributes like Candidate id, resume and the user can create update delete candidates here.
The Analytics module shows various metrics like job candidate details.

Points.title: title here
Points.Description: QuestMotors has an internal ticketing system to manage all their infrastructure powered by Azure NoSQL Cosmos DB. The system supports raising tickets, tracking them and even has ML powered Root Cause Analysis.

Popup.Text: QuestMotors has got their ITDesk360 system which having 2 primary modules like ticketing and analytics
The ticketing module helps to raise tickets having attributes like RCA, RCA category,assignee name, email address, title, user  query and status.
The analytics module shows count ticketing count by an end user.

Points.title: title here
Points.Description: QuestMotors has an internal legal system to manage all their issues powered by AWS NoSQL Cosmos DB. The system supports raising legal case, notifying them and provides various metrics.

Popup.Text: QuestMotors has got their Legal360 system which having 2 primary modules like legal case, notifications and analytics
The Legal Case module has attributes like legal case id, legal issues, responses, status and priority.
The Legal Case analytics module shows various legace case metrics like status by id.

Points.title: title here
Points.Description: QuestMotors intends to expand their customers beyond the existing Brick-and-Mortar stores to modern channels like web, social and other online channels. The company has invested a modern marketing system on IBM Cloud.

Popup.Text: QuestMotors has got their Marketing360 system which having 4 primary modules like Leads opportunities, channel, product and analytics.
The Leads module has attributes like lead id, product name, channel name, commute distance etc.
The channel module has 3 attributes like channel id, name and description.
The product module has attributes like product name, color, size, weight etc.

Points.title: title here
Points.Description: QuestMotors has transformed their on-premise legacy Work Orders and Routing system to a Zero-Maintenance SaaS database ElephantDB and Azure Web Front-end.  The system has on-premise sync via data gateway.

Popup.Text: QuestMotors has got their Production360 system which having 5 primary modules like work order ,work order routing ,product, scrap reason, location and analytics
The WorkOrder module has attributes like work order id, product id, order quantity, stocked quantity, scrapped quantity, due date etc.
The product module has attributes like product id, name, color, reorder, safety point, standard cost and date.
The scrap reason module has attributes like scrap reason id, name and date.
The location module has attributes like location id, name, cost rate, availability and date.
The analytics module shows various product metrics as per workorder and workorder routing.

Points.title: title here
Points.Description: QuestMotors have a strong customer presence of 1 million, primarily in Europe. The Sales system is powered by Snowflake and include advance analytics per auxiliary sales and support and compliant with GDPR, PCI, PII standards.

Popup.Text: QuestMotors has got their Sales360 system which having 3 primary modules like sales order details , sales reason and analytics
The sales order module have attributes like sales order id, customer id, purchase order id, ship method, account number, tax, freight charges etc.
The sales reason module has attributes like sales reason name, reason type  and date.
The Analytics module shows about various product sales metrics.

Points.title: title here
Points.Description: QuestMotors has a connected vendor system powered by Azure Cloud SQL and Data Lake Storage. The system manages the inter-connectivity of vendors, product, PO’s, Audits and compliance records. The system is multi-document compatible for purchase orders in JSON, XML and OCR compatible images.

Popup.Text: QuestMotors has got their Vendor360 system which having 3 primary modules like purchasing order, vendor and shipping.
The purchase order module has attributes like purchase order id, vendor id, shipping id,tax amount, freight etc.
The Vendor module has attributes like account number, name, credit rating, preferred vendor flag and purchasing website url etc.
The shipping module has attributes like shipping id, name, ship base, ship rate and date.
The Analytics module shows various purchase order metrics.

Points.title: title here
Points.Description: Quest Motors is envisioning a risk and disaster listening and warning system called ‘Bike 360’,which constantly scans and listens data from IoT Hubs and Risks from News, Social channels etc. For its supply chain and alerts all stakeholders in real time and even takes Intelligent AI powered healing actions !.

Popup.Text: Bike360 customer desk module chat bot to get resolution for the queries asked.
Bike360 allows user to know the status of the bike like location, spare parts wear tear, fuel and availanility.
Bike360 helps user to plan a trip giving all the possible options available.
